thread.title: Lovely boutique hotel in a safe and well located area
thread.title_full: Lovely boutique hotel in a safe and well located area - Review of Hotel de Seze, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Schirmer11
title: Lovely boutique hotel in a safe and well located area
text: This was our first trip to Paris and we had a great experience. Safe area, nice people. I specially loved the free chocolates at the entrance. Rooms are nice and I loved that Clarins body creme that was part of the guest kit. Thanks to the concierge, Leo, he was so helpful and nice.
